title: Hopewell Furnace National Historic Site: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics       Established as a National Park Service area: August 3, 1938 Park Size: 848.06 acres Annual Visitation: 2005: 50,578 2006: 49,239 2007: 56,013 2008: 49,328 2009: 53,186 2010: 55,750 2011: 44,873 2012: 53,470 2013: 46,738 Annual Budget (fiscal year): 2008: $1,331,000 2009: $1,387,000 2010: $1,406,000 2011: $1,387,000 2012: $1,368,000 2013: $1,296,000 2014: $1,353,000
